channel.title: Portfolios on Code and Crayons
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Code and Crayons

item.title: During my time at HiQ
item.description: HiQ is a larger consultant company where they help other companies digitalize themselves, or improve their already established digital world. This means that HiQ has their fingers in pretty much every industry and with an impressive range of cliens.

item.title: frontend developer at CYBM
item.description: CYBM is a company that I’ve founded together with five other people where I carry the role as one of two app developers. we also have a designer, backend developer, and two sale managers who also act as product owners and project managers.
